title: Convoy
content: This one stretch of interstate every time we are on it during the day there is an accident or something.   So we have found a good route to avoid major delays.  Well today there was a bad accident and supposably west bound said there was a helicopter on the road for injured.   They were saying 2 hour delays.  We were right at the exit we needed to avoid it.  Us and two other trucks avoided the accident and had a great visit on the radio.

feed.name: mrswrangler
feed.description: Thanks for following a cowgirl on her crazy life journey.
